HomePage.title: Enigmatic
HomePage.subtitle: Map. Build. Own.
HomePage.description: We design, connect, and orchestrate the processes your core systems ignore.

items.nodalDesc: The central operating system for modern industrial operations
items.useCasesDesc: See how Enigmatic solves real-world problems
items.aboutDesc: Learn about our mission and team

Mission.label: The Mission.
Mission.description: We architect your operational technology ecosystem to be more integrated, intelligent, and intuitive.

industries.transportationDesc: Unify carrier networks into a single command center for seamless execution.
industries.supplyChainDesc: Replace manual tracking with intelligent orchestration to predict disruptions.
industries.manufacturingDesc: Synchronize material flows with production schedules for zero-delay operations.
industries.constructionDesc: Streamline coordination between sites and suppliers for precise delivery.
industries.storageDesc: Accelerate fulfillment through intelligent workflows that optimize inventory.
industries.energyDesc: Modernize compliance tracking to ensure safe, efficient infrastructure logistics.

stats.desc1: of industrial enterprises struggle with fragmented data across disconnected legacy systems.
stats.desc2: of operational bandwidth is consumed by manual coordination between field and office.
stats.desc3: of potential margin is eroded by reactive problem-solving instead of strategic planning.

Problem.title: The Operational Fragmentation Problem.
Problem.description: Modern industrial operations are breaking under the weight of outdated tools and disconnected systems.

cards.manualDesc: Teams are still glued to spreadsheets, emails, and phone calls to coordinate complex operations. Critical updates get missed, schedules slip, and everyone works from different playbooks.
cards.disconnectedDesc: Silos between ERPs, specialized software, and field tools create blind spots. Data is double-entered, inaccurate, and trapped in systems that don't talk to each other.
cards.reactiveDesc: All this fragmentation forces your best people to spend their day chasing information and fixing errors instead of optimizing performance and driving growth.

Services.title: Orchestrate Your Operations.
Services.description: Move from chaos to clarity. Enigmatic unifies your fragmented tools and workflows into a single, intelligent digital ecosystem.

panels.consultingDesc: We don't just patch holes. We re-engineer your core operational workflows, replacing manual bottlenecks with scalable, automated solutions tailored to your unique infrastructure.
panels.nodalDesc: The central nervous system for your business. Nodal connects your teams, tools, and data into a single, intelligent interface—executing actions so you don't have to.

grid.triggersDesc: Automatically initiate complex workflows based on real-time signals—whether it's an incoming email, a status update, or an API event.
grid.humanDesc: Amplify your workforce. Intelligent routing ensures only critical exceptions reach your team, while standard tasks are handled instantly.
grid.connectivityDesc: Bridge the gap between legacy systems and modern tools. Unify data from ERPs, field devices, and external partners into one source of truth.

NodalPlatform.title: Unify Your Systems.
NodalPlatform.description: Nodal adds a powerful orchestration layer on top of your existing core systems and tools, giving you perfect consistency and visibility without replacing a single tool.

cards.flowDesc: Design pipelines that guide users through their daily tasks. Whether it's an event trigger from your TMS or a manual start, Nodal ensures everyone follows the same standardized process.
cards.connectDesc: Facilitate business processes by connecting disparate systems. Trigger actions automatically and monitor execution across your entire stack.
cards.extendDesc: Add custom calculations and automated alerts. Get full visibility into your data without changing your existing tech stack.
cards.humanDesc: Seamlessly route exceptions to operators. Ensure critical decisions get human attention while keeping the rest of your process running on autopilot.

Principles.title: Generic software ignores operational reality.
Principles.description: To build a resilient enterprise, you need more than just tools. You need a philosophy of engineering.

cards.intelligenceDesc: Automation shouldn't replace your team—it should elevate them. We handle the repetitive execution so your experts can focus on high-value decisions.
cards.precisionDesc: When mistakes cost millions, 'good enough' isn't an option. We engineer fault-tolerant workflows designed to withstand the pressure of real-world operations.
cards.visibilityDesc: No more black boxes or data silos. We unify your operational context into a single source of truth, giving you the clarity to act before problems escalate.

CTA.label: Get in Touch
CTA.title: Modernize what moves the world.
CTA.description: Help us untangle the world’s most complex systems. If you’re driven by real problems and real impact, Enigmatic is where your work matters.

Footer.tagline: Digitizing complex workflows and building automated solutions that power the future of industrial operations.

UseCasesPage.title: Use Cases.
UseCasesPage.description: See how Enigmatic and Nodal digitize manual workflows and orchestrate complex operations at scale.
UseCasesPage.ctaDescription: Our team of engineers can build custom workflows tailored to your specific operational needs.

cards.onboardingDesc: Every carrier deals with chaotic onboarding workflows spread across Tenstreet, HRIS, email, spreadsheets, and safety checks. Nodal compresses this messy flow into one unified view, automating compliance steps and document collection.
cards.maintenanceDesc: Maintenance is often reactive and fragmented. With Nodal, a technician submitting a DVIR triggers parts ordering, work assignments, and approvals automatically, orchestrating cross-team work beyond the TMS.
cards.billingDesc: Accelerate cash flow by reducing leakage. Nodal provides a single workflow view for billing and claims, handling tasks, attachments, and validations before submitting clean data to your TMS or accounting system.
cards.predictiveDesc: Connect the shop floor to top floor. Ingest live sensor data to detect anomalies, automatically trigger work orders in your CMMS, and reschedule production shifts in your ERP without manual intervention.
cards.productionDesc: Real-time monitoring of material inputs and outputs. When inventory drops below thresholds, Nodal's AI agents negotiate replenishment with suppliers instantly.
cards.fieldDesc: Bridge the gap between the job site and the back office. Site foremen can report issues via SMS or Chat, which Nodal translates into formal RFI documents and ticket requests.
cards.constructionDesc: Just-in-time delivery for complex sites. Coordinate concrete pours and material drops by syncing site requests directly with batch plants and logistics dispatchers.

messages.dragVariables: Drag variables into node inputs to use data from previous steps.

hero.title: About Us.
hero.subtitle: Building the future of logistics with intelligence and precision.

team.title: Our Team
team.samDescription: Sam shapes the strategic vision for Enigmatic's identity, products, and services, uniting top-tier talent to fundamentally reimagine the logistics technology ecosystem.
team.chrisDescription: Chris spearheads operations and strategic partnerships, focusing on scaling Enigmatic's market presence and delivering value to key industry stakeholders.
team.phiDescription: Phi architects Enigmatic's technical foundation, leading research and development to deliver cutting-edge, robust solutions that push the boundaries of logistics tech.

story.title: Founded by Logistics Enthusiasts.
story.description: We are a team of logistics industry veterans with decades of hands-on experience optimizing supply chains. We combine this operational depth with serious engineering expertise to deliver strategic consulting and Nodal, our platform for standardizing and orchestrating business processes.

cta.title: Join our journey
cta.description: Interested in working with us or learning more about our platform?

descriptions.http: Send an HTTP request to any API endpoint or service.
descriptions.apiTrigger: Starts a new flow run when data is received via the generated URL.
descriptions.api-trigger: Starts a new flow run when data is received via the generated URL.
descriptions.manualTrigger: Start the flow manually from the dashboard for testing.
descriptions.manual-trigger: Start the flow manually from the dashboard for testing.
descriptions.condition: Branch the flow based on logical rules (If/Else).
descriptions.filter: Stop the flow execution if conditions are not met.
descriptions.loop: Iterate over a list of items and run steps for each.
descriptions.variable: Create or update a variable for use in later steps.
descriptions.switch: Route the flow into different paths based on values.
descriptions.map: Transform data structures from one format to another.
descriptions.humanTask: Pause the flow and wait for human approval or input.
descriptions.human-task: Pause the flow and wait for human approval or input.
descriptions.goto: Jump to another step in the flow.

apiTrigger.noSchemaDescription: Any JSON body sent to the webhook will be accepted.
